property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: DeveloperName for the object being filters (eg. Product2)

property.name: uniqueFieldName
property.label: Unique Field Name
property.description: Field Name on the target object (eg Product) that is the unique identifier - can be ID or another External Id field.

property.name: isActiveFieldName
property.label: IsActive Field Name
property.description: Field Name on the target object (eg Product) that determines if the product is active. Can be omitted but must be a Checkbox field or formula if included.
